title: Brazil halts sales of charger-less iPhones, fines Apple $2.3 million
description: Selling iPhones without chargers only passes burden on to the consumer, feds say.

title: We peek inside Porsche’s private Le Mans race car test
description: Ars attended a test for the new hybrid endurance prototype car, the 963.

title: Samsung starts shipping Android 12L after a six-month wait
description: Google's tablet-focused release is finally coming to large-screen Samsung devices.

title: Archaeologists unearth remains of 17th century female “vampire” in Poland
description: Female skeleton was buried with sickle placed across her neck and a padlock on big toe.

title: Hyper’s 140 W charger is a smaller brick for the biggest MacBooks
description: Gallium nitride allows for more ports, smaller size than Apple's charger.

title: With Stable Diffusion, you may never believe what you see online again
description: AI image synthesis goes open source, with big implications.

title: Astounding new Webb image reveals tens of thousands of young stars
description: This stellar nursery is located in the Large Magellanic Cloud.

title: Best of 2000 AD proves why the comics are classic
description: New anthology of British series actually manages to collect the work that makes it great.

title: Steam Deck offers elegant dual-screen emulation for 3DS, Wii U
description: Valve hardware provides a simple, authentic emulated experience.

title: Ireland fines Instagram 405M euro for failing to protect children’s data
European space chief “cannot see” a return to cooperation with Russia
description: "We cannot work with a partner who is completely trampling on those values."
